Html:
Hi,

possible to include the flash uninstaller in the patch?
currently i am patching flash 18.0.0.203 to the clients but some of the clients have flash 18.0.0.209 installed and is causing patching error 80070643 when they are installing the updates.
is there a way to check and not installed to those client with the newer version?

thanks

Hi,
possible to include the flash uninstaller in the patch?
Yes, simply make a custom update.
is there a way to check and not installed to those client with the newer version?
Yes, when you create your package, in the "IsInstallable" pane, add a rule that detect this version of Adobe Flash Player.
At the "IsInstallable" pane, do I add the rule at update level or package level? What the difference?
Is there an option to check if the reg version greater than 18.0.
Yes, there is a rule for that : Reg_sz to Version
Ok but do I add in update rule or package rule? Any difference? Sent from my iPhone
No difference. You can add it at any level.
